articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my warmest congratulations and comradely salute on your birthday.
					
					 I sincerely wish you good health and success in your responsible work for the victorious advance of the Cuban revolution in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Italian President
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Giorgio Napolitano, Italian president, on June 1 on the occasion of its National Day.
					 In the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would further expand and develop, Kim in the message wished the president and people of Italy success in their work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim Visits Children's Department Store
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim Visits Children's Department Store
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Friday made field survey of the Children's Department Store.
					 Employees and builders of the department store who had honor of receiving on-the-spot guidance provided by the dear respected Kim Jong Un are dynamically stepping its construction project at a final phase.
					
					 The premier went round various places of the department store associated with the leadership of Kim Jong Un before holding a working consultative meeting of officials concerned for implementing his instructions.
					
					 At the meeting Choe called for bearing in mind the noble outlook of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu on the younger generation whereby they put forward children as kings of the country and made sure that joyful laughter and songs of children resounded under the blue sky of the country.
					
					 The meeting took thorough measures for producing and supplying goods for children and improving the service for them.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Pyongyang Folk Park
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Pyongyang Folk Park
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Pyongyang Folk Park undertaken by the Korean People's Army has entered its final stage.
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made field survey of the park nearing its completion on Thursday.
					
					 Soldier-builders, bearing deep in mind the on-site teachings given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in January this year, have pushed forward the project in the fighting spirit and with the mettle of creation of the revolutionary army which goes through with anything at one go once it buckles down with determination.
					
					 Choe, together with officials concerned, went round various places of the construction site.
					
					 He underscored the need to carry out the final project in a responsible manner, saying that the construction of the park is an important work to realize the desire of leader Kim Jong Il who was so concerned about providing the people with better base for cultural and emotional life.
					
					 All the soldier-builders should ensure the quality of the construction on the highest level by effecting the WPK's policy on making architecture formative and artistic, Choe said.
					
					 There were concrete discussions for the commanding officers to take good care of the life of soldiers as their real elder brothers and sisters would do and finish the construction of the park on the principle of ensuring the convenience of the people on a preferential basis as intended by the WPK.
					
					 Choe stressed the need for all the soldier-builders to complete the project on the highest level under the banner of learning from Kim Jong Il's patriotism, bearing deep in mind Kim Jong Un's noble outlook on the people.

articles.title: KPA Military Band Comes back Home
articles.content:
KPA Military Band Comes back Home
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Military Band of the Korean People's Army led by Colonel Kang Il Nam returned home Friday after participating in the 1st Far East International Military Band Festival held in Khabarovsk, Russia and visiting Amur Region. 
					 The Russian financial and economic delegation headed by Vice-Minister of Finance Sergey Storchak left here on Friday.

articles.title: Committees for Implementing 6.15 Declaration Issues Press Release
articles.content:
Committees for Implementing 6.15 Declaration Issues Press Release
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The North, South and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued the following joint press release on Friday:
					 As already known, All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration discussed the issue of holding with splendor a reunification event common to the nation at Mt. Kumgang resort on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of the joint declaration at the working-level contact of the north, the south and overseas sides made in Shenyang, China early in February. 
					
					 This was the just efforts of the non-governmental reunification movement to immediately defuse the present phase of confrontation and pave the way for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification through the implementation of inter-Korean declarations and has enjoyed great concern and support at home and abroad.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, however, are sticking to the stand that they cannot allow the above-said event. Worse still, they are putting all sorts of political pressure upon the delegation of the south side committee which had attended the above-said contact to defuse the phase of confrontation and promote the event.
					
					 The historic June 15 joint declaration should be implemented without fail as it is the common landmark for reunification which ushered in a new era in the national history.
					
					 All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration decided to hold the event in the north and the south and abroad separately under the situation where their delegates are unable to meet at one place due to the south Korean authorities' unreasonable disallowance of contact and vicious moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 Though the event has to be held separately this year, All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration will invariably demonstrate the firm will and spirit of all the fellow countrymen to advance for reconciliation, peace and independent reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: KCU Delegates of Ryanggang Province Excited to Arrive Here
articles.content:
KCU Delegates of Ryanggang Province Excited to Arrive Here
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Delegates of Ryanggang Province to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union are greatly rejoiced and excited to arrive here by air on Friday.
					 Sin Tae Myong, 12, second year student of Sinhung Secondary School of Hyesan City, said that he flew for the first time. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					When I was flying over the country in the airliner sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un with loving care, I felt I were upbeat and happiest.
					
					 I will fully prepare myself to be a knowledgeable, virtuous and healthy worker.
					
					 Kim Jin Hyok, 12,  1st year student of Kim Jong Suk Secondary School in Kim Jong Suk County, said that when thinking I was flying for Pyongyang in an airliner which I watched on TV only, I felt as if I were dreaming.
					
					 He continued: 
					
					 But it was a reality.
					
					 I will be better at study and in organizational life and do my bit to demonstrate our country before the world, always bearing in mind the dear respected Kim Jong Un's love for us.
					
					 Jong Su Rim, 13,  3rd year student of Jongilbong Secondary School in Samjiyon County, said, her face beaming with a smile of immense happiness: 
					
					 Our father Kim Jong Un called us to Pyongyang which we longed to visit so much even in dreams.
					
					 We are the happiest children in the world.
					
					 I would like to heartily thank Kim Jong Un for bestowing us great happiness, regarding us children as kings of the country.

articles.title: KCU Delegates from Ryanggang Province
articles.content:
KCU Delegates from Ryanggang Province
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Ryanggang Province in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea finished appointing delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union.
					 Among the delegates are Min Hong Dan, a second-year student at Sodu Secondary School in Taehongdan County, and the triplets, Hwang Un Jong, Hwang Un Dok and Hwang Un Hye, second-year students at Phungsan Secondary School in Kim Hyong Gwon County.
					
					 Min Hong Dan is a schoolgirl widely known in the country.
					
					 In March 2000 when providing his field guidance to Taehongdan County, leader Kim Jong Il dropped in at the family of a discharged soldier, Min Won Sik, her father, to learn in detail about their living conditions. Asked to give a name to their unborn baby by Min's wife, the leader kindly said it would be desirable to name the soon-to-be-born baby Tae Hong, if it is a boy or Hong Dan, if it is a girl.
					
					 Hong Dan grew up to be an exemplary member of the KCU under the warm care of the peerlessly great man.
					
					 She has distinguished herself in study and KCU organizational life, and was awarded Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize on the occasion of the auspicious Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A farmer, Hwang Chang Un (50), father of the triplets, told KCNA:
					
					 "It seems to me like a dream that my daughters and son are to go to Pyongyang as KCU delegates to the significant celebrations.
					
					 I will fully discharge my duty as an agricultural worker, always cherishing this benevolence in mind.
					
					 My wife and I are determined to bring up our children into reliable pillars of Songun Korea, intensely loyal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un."

articles.title: KCU Delegates Are Coming to Pyongyang
articles.content:
KCU Delegates Are Coming to Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) are coming to Pyongyang by air, train and buses specially provided under the loving care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 At least 1,600 KCU delegates of North Hamgyong Province and Rason City arrived here on May 30 by air. They were followed by delegates of Ryanggang Province on June 1.
					
					 Delegates of South Hamgyong, North Phyongan and Jagang provinces are coming here by special train.
					
					 They were accorded warm hospitality and blessings at each railway station.
					
					 Read on the faces of delegates is the gratitude of the children of ordinary working people to the WPK and the motherland for providing big state events to them and according them warm welcome with flowers. 
					
					 Those delegates of Nampho City and South Phyongan and North and South Hwanghae provinces are coming here by buses.
					
					 As legends about the deepest loving care could be heard in the sky and on the ground, KCNA reporter could hear excited voices everywhere.
					
					 Chief Captain of an airliner Choe Jin Myong, 41, had this to say: It is the first time since the appearance of Pyongyang Airport that airliners flew one after another to bring children. It is an eye-opening reality which can be brought about only by the dear respected Kim Jong Un possessed of such noble outlook on the younger generation that there is nothing to spare for the children, masters of the future and kings of the country, though the situation in the country remains very difficult. This is something rare to be seen in any other country.
					
					 Ri Song Ho, secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, 39, noted:
					
					 This is not the feelings of more than 20,000 delegates alone. The hearts of all the KCU members are running to Pyongyang, the heart of Korea, where Kim Jong Un lives, though they are hailing from different places.
					
					 Pyongyang will welcome cheerful delegates of three million members of the KCU boasting their red neckties. They will adorn the history with legends about the profound loving care shown by the peerlessly great person on the basis of his noble outlook on the younger generation.

articles.title: Int'l Children's Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Children's Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A joint friendship gathering took place at the Taesongsan Pleasure Ground on Friday to mark the 62nd International Children's Day. 
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly; Han Kwang Bok, vice-premier of the Cabinet; Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission; Ryang Man Gil, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee; officials concerned and children and women in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Invited to the gathering were foreign diplomats and members of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here, foreign guests including children and women, overseas Koreans staying in the homeland and Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification. 
					
					 The gathering began with the juvenile congratulatory stage "Smile Broader". 
					
					 Kindergarten children sang and danced to the tune of "Holiday of our flower buds". 
					
					 Then the stage of talents "Skills of children" followed. 
					
					 Children impressively showed their talents and happiness in colorful pieces including talent of skipping rope "Jumping over festoon", riding unicycle, hand feats and skills of folk games. 
					
					 Foreign children sang in chorus songs "We Are Grateful to Marshal Kim Il Sung" and "We Are Grateful to Dear Leader" to win acclaims by the audience. 
					
					 After the rhythmic exercise of kindergarten children, Korean and foreign children played sports and amusement games. 
					
					 They shared pleasures of the holiday through picture puzzle, running with mother with ball in one arm, apple-picking, basketball game, tug of war, etc. 
					
					 After the games the participants danced to the tune of "Our mind is one" and presented maypole and train plays, adding to the atmosphere.
					
					 Meanwhile, a similar joint meeting for friendship took place at Chongam Kindergarten in Chongam District, Chongjin City of North Hamgyong Province, on the same day. 
					
					 Present there were members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general in Chongjin.

articles.title: DPRK Children Mark Int'l Children's Day
articles.content:
DPRK Children Mark Int'l Children's Day
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Children of the DPRK marked International Children's Day on June 1.
					 The nurseries, kindergartens, parks and recreation grounds across the country were crowded with happy children and their kindergarteners and parents in holiday dresses.
					
					 There took place colorful sports and amusement games and art performances at Kim Jong Suk Nursery, Ryugyong Nursery No. 1, the Ryonhwa Nursery, the Changgwang Kindergarten, Pyongyang Tangsang Kindergarten No. 2 and Taesongsan and Moranbong recreation grounds.
					
					 Children in different parts of the country also enjoyed their holiday in excitement.
					
					 Among them are iron bases such as the Kangson Steel Complex and the Sonjin Steel Complex and machine-building factories in Taean and Rakwon and fertilizer-production bases in Hungnam and Namhung and co-op farms in Samjigang of Jaeryong County, Tongbong of Hamju County, Sinam of Ryongchon County and Unhung of Thaechon County.
					
					 Children held meetings to tell about their prides and sports and amusement games.
					
					 They vividly showed their happiness of bringing their hope and talents to full blossom as king of the country.

articles.title: Farmers Encouraged by Agitation Activities
articles.content:
Farmers Encouraged by Agitation Activities
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The frontline-style agitation activities for increased production resounds through the cooperative farm fields of the DPRK where rice-transplantation is at the height.
					 The art squads in Pyongyang rushed to the countryside of South and North Hwanghae, South Phyongan and Kangwon provinces.
					
					 The performance of the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble sounded the marching song of the Songun era, enlivening the farm work in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Their performances in Haeju, Sinchon, Chongdan, Ongjin, Jangyon, Samchon and other cities and counties associated with the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il have greatly encouraged the agricultural workers and helpers.
					
					 The artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe helped the farmers with their rice-transplantation in Jaeryong, Anak, Unryul counties while conducting a brisk art performance and agitation for increased production.
					
					 The frontline-style agitation activities for increased production by the artistes of the National Theatrical Troupe are also under way in the farms of Paechon, Yonan, Chongdan and other counties. 
					
					 The Phibada Opera Troupe is active in North Hwanghae Province to arouse the masses to increased production. They made an agitation tour of more than 10 rural villages of Koksan County.
					
					 The National Folk Art Troupe made a performance tour of the farms of South Phyongan Province.
					
					 Their performances full of militant stamina helped push ahead with the pending farm work including rice-transplantation in a substantial manner.
					
					 The colorful acrobatic numbers given by the Pyongyang Circus made all people on the farms of Phyonggang County, Kangwon Province, feel the worth and delight of their labor.

articles.title: Teachers Fascinated by Greatness of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Teachers Fascinated by Greatness of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Teachers at Changjon Primary School, built fashionably in the heart of the capital city of Pyongyang, have been seized with excitements after having the dear respected Kim Jong Un's guidance tour of the school a few days ago.
					 The principal of the school, Kim Su Bok, told KCNA:
					
					 "It was likely that I saw President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il the moment I looked at Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Going round the school, he gave an instruction to carry on educational work in conformity with psychological features of schoolchildren.
					
					 I will redouble my efforts to creditably bring up the schoolchildren, true to his on-site teachings."
					
					 The chief of Kyongsang Kindergarten, Ri Kang Juk, said:
					
					 "The dear respected Kim Jong Un's recent guidance tour of our modernly-built kindergarten has put us into a tumult of joy.
					
					 He enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarteners, highly appreciating it, and had a photo session with the performers. I keenly felt his noble outlook on posterity.
					
					 We will strive to turn out many more music prodigies, as intended by Kim Jong Un who is identical to leader Kim Jong Il."

articles.title: Baleen Craft "Sailboat", Gift to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Baleen Craft "Sailboat", Gift to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Baleen craft "Sailboat" is one of the gifts on display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This gift was presented to President Kim Il Sung on his 73rd birthday by Hokushu Company of Japan. The company made the sailboat's design by itself and invited a talented man to craft it.
					
					 The gift consists of semi-limpid brown sails, tightened ropes and a wooden prop redolent of rough sea, showing a boat sailing through raging waves. The mast and hull are made of wood and the canvases woven with baleens.

articles.title: Tanchon Port on East Coast of DPRK
articles.content:
Tanchon Port on East Coast of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Tanchon Port, built on a modern basis on the east coast of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, is one of monumental edifices in the Songun (military-first) era.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had paid deep attention to building the port.
					
					 The port boasts of two 2,000-odd-meter-long moles, wharves, a control room and an office building. It can handle millions of tons of cargos a year.
					
					 The moles are strong enough to protect the port from surging waves and the office building is redolent of vessel and wave. The computerized control room helps reduce anchorage time of ships and raise cargo-handling capacity.
					
					 Several large cargo ships can anchor the port at a time. 
					
					 A cultural house and basketball and football grounds are built in the compound of the port.
					
					 The port will be greatly conducive to developing the nation's economy.

articles.title: Taehung Youth Hero Mine
articles.content:
Taehung Youth Hero Mine
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Employees of the Taehung Youth Hero Mine in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been making big efforts to boost mineral output and further upgrade the quality of processed magnesia.
					 The mine, developed late in the 1980s, boasts of billions of tons of deposits, which account for over 25 percent of the world's magnesite deposits. 
					
					 It makes various kinds of processed magnesia products, including magnesia clinker, high-quality magnesia clinker and light-burned magnesia, along with the mining of magnesite.
					
					 The application of a new open-air mining method paved the way to mining ores in large quantity. In particular, the mine established the system of producing magnesia clinker and light-burned magnesia by the locally available fuel. It also invented a new method to turn out second-stage processed light-burned magnesia.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the mine on several occasions, highly appreciating its employees for having succeeded in introducing the Juche-based production system of processed magnesia.
					
					 The mine is now striving to export high-quality magnesia products.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses US of Conspiratorial Plots before Election
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses US of Conspiratorial Plots before Election
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Political circles in south Korea are becoming more tumultuous than ever before with the "presidential" election slated to take place in December. 
					 American experts on Korean affairs flew into south Korea one on the heels of the other against this backdrop. They included the director of the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies, the chief of the room for south Korean affairs and the chief of the room for Japanese affairs of the same centre, former assistant secretaries of State, the former national security advisor of the White House, etc.
					
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-mentioned American experts claimed the purpose of their south Korean junkets was to participate in a seminar co-sponsored by Choongang Ilbo, a south Korean paper, and the American center but this was nothing but red herring.
					
					 This was evidenced by the fact that they spent more time for sounding out the views and stances of Park Geun Hye and others tipped as "presidential candidates" on the U.S.-south Korean relations and the inter-Korean relations after meeting them than attending the seminar.
					
					 This is an indication that the U.S. has become undisguised in its moves to ensure the stay of the pro-U.S. conservative regime in power through the forthcoming election.
					
					 What matters is that the conservative forces in their accusations against the DPRK cried out for "slapping more stringent sanctions" against it with what they called deterrence, not content with renewing their pledges to "boost the strategic alliance" and "implement FTA" in a bid to please their American masters who examine their qualifications as a president.
					
					This is a disgusting message sent to the U.S. that they just wish for "presidential office" in return for doing harm to fellow countrymen, offering whatever it wants.
					
					 Very pleased with this, the American masters said "visits were very much impressed" and recognized their worth as their cat's paws.
					
					 The conservative group, however, are sadly mistaken. It is not the U.S. but the south Korean people that have a key to victory in the election.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean conservative group seem to have forgotten this truth.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Lee Myung Bak's Intention of "Provocation"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Lee Myung Bak's Intention of "Provocation"
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers obsessed with confrontation with fellow countrymen vociferate about "provocation" by someone, building up public opinion about it. 
					 Their persistent spread of the story about "additional provocation" by someone is to justify their reckless confrontation moves and political and military provocative campaign against the DPRK that have become evermore intensified. Rodong Sinmun on Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The story about "additional provocation by the north" is nothing but a pretext to boost cooperation with outside forces for aggression of the DPRK, step up arms buildup and realize the scenario of war against the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet group has been vocal about "provocation" by someone whenever it staged joint military exercises with the U.S. against the DPRK under the various codenames including Key Resolve and Foal Eagle. This was prompted by the sinister intention to make the old story about "southward invasion" sound plausible and intensify the war exercises against the DPRK under the pretext of "defense". But, with nothing can it cover up their aggressive nature and danger.
					
					 The "additional provocation by the north" trumpeted about by the group of traitors assumes gravity and danger as it is timed to coincide with the moves for igniting a nuclear war against the north evermore escalated by the south Korean warmongers in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 History has never seen such a group of traitors as Lee group which left the whole of south Korea to the tender mercy of the U.S. as the theatre of a nuclear war and paved the way for the sworn-enemy Japanese reactionaries' reinvasion of Korea. 
					
					 Those who like playing with fire on the nuclear arsenal can not escape the fate of tiger moth perishing in the flames.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes Lee Myung Bak's "Human Right Issue" in DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes Lee Myung Bak's "Human Right Issue" in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak met the delegation of the U.S. House of Representatives and let loose impudent rigmarole that the north's "human rights issue is pending an urgent solution" and the like, imploring for zealous meddling in the "north's human right issue." 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Lee's hue and cry over the "human right" issue of the DPRK is nothing but a groundless mud-slinging at the dignified socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 The "human right" issue does not exist and such thing can never be in the DPRK as it fully provides an institutional guarantee for the independent right of the working people, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 South Korea is the horrible tundra of human rights as it has turned into a living hell where human dignity and right are mercilessly trampled down. No wonder, the majority of the students of middle and high schools in south Korea said they wished to live in foreign countries, extremely disillusioned with the society. It is Lee and his group that have reduced south Korea to an area unfit for human habitation.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by Lee in soliciting even before U.S. congressmen for cooperation in the anti-DPRK smear campaign over its "human rights" issue, not content with staging such racket in south Korea and abroad by setting in motion vicious conservative elements and despicable human scum. This is aimed at realizing the nonsensical dream of "achieving the unification of system" at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group is getting frantic with such noisy anti-DPRK campaign though it is more dead than alive, set to face a judgment of people. Needless to say, it is hordes of thrice-cursed traitors whom the nation cannot live under the same sky as it seeks a way out in confrontation with compatriots.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Crackdown upon Progressive Forces
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Crackdown upon Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea in a radio speech on May 28 blustered "the north's assertion that the 'Cheonan' warship case was south Korea's own making is a problem but the existence of those forces following the north echoing that assertion is a bigger problem."
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a product of a sinister scenario to link the progressive forces in south Korea to the DPRK in a bid to more brutally suppress them.
					
					 It is brazen-faced, indeed, for Lee to try to shift onto the DPRK the responsibility for the warship case whose truth had already been revealed, while letting loose the above-said rhetoric. This is nothing but another politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 Ever since it came to power, the Lee group has raised a whirlwind of suppression of progressive forces in their actions to improve the relations between the north and the south and achieve independent reunification through the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration, calling for "eliminating pro-north leftist forces."
					
					 Lee's louder vociferation about "forces following the north" than ever before is designed to justify his undisguised crackdown on progressive forces by linking them with the DPRK and incite distrust in them among south Koreans in a bid to ostracize them in the society.
					
					 It is a trite method of the successive fascist dictators to find a way out of their extreme ruling crisis in suppressing progressive forces.
					
					 If such moves of the group of traitors are overlooked, conservative forces will stay in power. This would bring again unspeakable misfortune and disaster to the south Koreans.

articles.title: KCNA Ridicules US Impertinent "Advice"
articles.content:
KCNA Ridicules U.S. Impertinent "Advice"
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- No sooner had the "Country Reports on Human Rights Practices for 2011" been issued by the U.S. State Department than it was hit hard by the international community. 
					 Many countries of the world bitterly denounced the U.S. report, branding it as an example of politicizing human rights and the height of the application of double standards. 
					
					 This time too, the U.S. showed its bad habit of malignantly slandering the independent countries opposed to its high-handed practices and hegemony including the DPRK. 
					
					 It proved once again that the U.S. annual "report on human rights" is nothing but "bubble" of human rights and a paper for hatching plots to do harm to the anti-imperialist and independent countries and seek a pretext for aggression and interference. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, there is neither "human rights issue" nor "issue of people's living" much touted by the U.S. in the DPRK. We have never asked the U.S. to take care of our human rights. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. worked out the "report on human rights" on the basis of misinformation provided by traitors to the nation and human scum. This suffices to indicate what its standard for human rights and its view on the value of human rights are like.
					
					 Since its foundation the U.S. has suffered leprosy of human rights. 
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has considered human rights abuses and man-killing as its mythology of founding the state and way of its existence. 
					
					 The American Civil War waged right after the foundation of the state left nearly one million people killed and wounded. 
					
					 The U.S. has earned an ill fame as a kingdom of murder. 
					
					 The U.S. magazine Foreign Policy on Jan. 9, 2011 said that more than 30,000 Americans die every year due to gun-related violence and another 200,000 are reported to be wounded. 
					
					 Before and after World War II the U.S. used thousands of African blacks and people of Guatemala as guinea pigs under the guise of "free treatment" and steadily conducted tests on living-bodies early in the 1970s, too. 
					
					  In the new century the U.S. has massacred innocent civilians in Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya and other parts of the world and brutally suppressed participants in the Occupy Wall Street demos against capitalism. 
					
					 Throughout its history spanning 200 odd years the U.S. has not spent even a single day without seeing human blood in scenes of genocides. 
					
					 The U.S. is the worst country in the world in using "human rights issue" as a political lever for realizing its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. pursuance of hostile policy toward the DPRK and the moves to stifle it for nearly seven decades has brought immeasurable losses to the DPRK's economic construction and cultural development for welfare of the people and improvement of people's living standard. 
					
					 The U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world as it has historically and systematically violated human rights of the Korean nation and blocked democratic development. 
					
					 Human rights means national sovereignty and genuine human rights are guaranteed by the national sovereignty. 
					
					 That is why the army and people of the DPRK deem it as its supreme mission to protect its national sovereignty in view of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 If the U.S. is to truly respect the human rights of the Korean people, it should immediately roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and stop military provocations against it and moves to tighten the sanctions and stifle it.

articles.title: S. Korean Press Union Members Launch Hunger Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Press Union Members Launch Hunger Strike
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- Ri Kang Thaek, chairperson of the south Korean Press Trade Union, and Kim Hyon Sok, chief of the Headquarters of KBS, started hunger strike on May 29.
					 They held a press conference as regards the hunger strike in Seoul.
					
					 They at the press conference said that members of the union are on an indefinite general strike in protest against the authorities' moves to control the press. They said that the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Saenuri Party" are busy distorting the truth about their moves to put the press under their control and dodging the responsibility for it while talking about the "politically-motivated strike" and "illegal strike".
					
					 The people are hardly repressing their resentment at Park Geun Hye who seeks to revive the departed soul of "yusin" dictator and make media a trumpeter of the "government" just as Lee Myung Bak did, they said, adding they are now witnessing the uncontrollable regime which defies the demands of the people for no reason.
					
					 Declaring that they would wage hunger strike in demand of replacement of conservative media's directors, impartiality of media and reinstatement of dismissed pressmen, they renewed their will to make more dynamic efforts to surely punish the present "government".

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Prosecution for Its Reckless Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Prosecution for Its Reckless Suppression
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore in an editorial on May 29 condemned the puppet prosecution for its reckless suppression.
					 The editorial recalled that on May 20 the prosecution filed a suit against the manager of the Internet newspaper Surprise on the charge of "intimidation" for the mere reason he posted on it an article openly critical of Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The charge of "special threat" made by the prosecution is absolutely unreasonable, the editorial held, adding:
					
					 The prosecution also brought the charge of "intimidation" against a personage who is under investigation on the charge of libel for the mere reason that he posted on an Internet website an animation file showing the nose of rat-like Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The legal circles assert that they can hardly understand the action taken by the prosecution to punish the personage on charge of "intimidation" for expressing his political view, the editorial stressed.

articles.title: Magazine of Koreans in China Releases Its May Issue
articles.content:
Magazine of Koreans in China Releases Its May Issue
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC) released the May issue of magazine "Paektu-Halla" accompanied with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un making a speech at the military parade marking the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It carried the full text of the work of Kim Jong Un "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun".
					
					 It also conveyed the news that Kim Jong Un was elected first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the Fourth Conference of the WPK and that he was elected first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission at the Fifth Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 It gave accounts of the meetings, Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia exhibitions, photo and book exhibitions, art performances, remembrance concerts and other colorful functions held by the GAKC and its affiliated organizations to mark the centenary of the birth of the President.
					
					 It carried articles and a poem written by Korean artistes in China on their impressions of the homeland after taking part in the 28th April Spring Friendship Art Festival. Their titles are "We will advance under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un", "Watching military paraders marching in fine array", "Renewing pledge of loyalty" and "In Pyongyang of beautiful motherland".
					
					 It carried the statements released by the GAKC and its affiliated bodies condemning the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and news of candle-light actions staged in south Korea in protest against the import of American beef and others.

articles.title: Korea's Cause Supported by WFDY
articles.content:
Korea's Cause Supported by WFDY
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth (WFDY) was held in Zimbabwe on May 23 and 24.
					 Present there were the president and the general-secretary of the federation, delegations and delegates of 31 youth and student organizations from 29 countries including the DPRK, Cuba, Vietnam and Russia and personages and members of the Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front and youth organizations under it.
					
					 Delegates of different countries in their speeches demanded the U.S. withdraw its troops from south Korea and the south Korean authorities stop at once the moves against the DPRK.
					
					 The meeting adopted and published the statement of the federation on the peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, a political statement of the meeting expressing support and solidarity with the DPRK and an action program of the federation.
					
					 The statements urged the south Korean authorities to unconditionally stop the heinous anti-DPRK rackets and the U.S. to discontinue the war exercises for aggression against the DPRK and pull its troops and war military hardware out of south Korea.
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for its implementation, are the most just landmark for achieving the reunification of the country independently and peacefully by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, the statements said. They demanded the U.S. and other countries concerned responsible for the division of the Korean Peninsula render positive cooperation in thoroughly implementing the declarations.
					
					 The General Council of the federation decided to positively conduct multifarious solidarity activities for denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' moves for confrontation with the DPRK and supporting the Korean people and youth in their struggle for the sovereignty and development of the country and its independent and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Carried by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The main content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" was carried by the 20th issue of the Russian paper Patriot.
					 The work, published on April 6, 2012, clarifies that it is a principled requirement for the victorious advance of the Korean revolution to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to steadily develop the WPK into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, the detailed content of his work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was carried by the Myanmar paper The Voice on May 26.
					
					 The speech made by him on April 15, 2012 clarifies that the 100-year long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the iron truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of a country and nation. 
					
					 Expounded in the speech is an idea that the glorious 100-year long history of Juche Korea and the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea are guaranteed by the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It indicates the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages, successfully accomplish the cause of building a thriving socialist nation, etc.

articles.title: DPRK Does What It Should Do: Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK Does What It Should Do: Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 1 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship issued a statement on May 24 in support of the answer given by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry rejecting the declaration of the G-8 summit in the U.S.
					 In the declaration of the summit the heads of G-8 took issue with the DPRK's satellite launch and nuclear activities.
					
					 This is a politically-motivated provocation such as encroaching upon the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK by following the U.S. which is sticking to its bad habit of antagonizing the DPRK in disregard of justice and truth, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 They do not have even an elementary yardstick to judge what is right and wrong.
					
					 Why do they keep silent over the satellite launch of France and other countries, while kicking up a racket over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes?
					
					 It is hardly understandable that the aims of other countries' satellite launches are not considered as problematic while only the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is called into question.
					
					 The DPRK is not such a country which is barred from doing what it should do due to G-8's accusation and obstruction. It is an independent country which launches satellites and conducts nuclear activities its own way with its faith.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship joins the world peace-loving progressive people in supporting the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear activities and voicing militant and fraternal solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle.

articles.title: China Condemns US Aggressions and Massacres
articles.content:
China Condemns US Aggressions and Massacres
 Beijing, May 31 (KCNA) -- The "Human Rights Record of the United States in 2011" issued by the Information Office of the State Council of China on May 25 denounced the U.S. aggressions and butcheries in different parts of the world. 
					 China's report said the U.S.-led wars have created humanitarian disasters, although the wars were allegedly waged as "humanitarian intervention" efforts and for "the rise of a new democratic nation," citing the death toll in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan. Such "American-style massacre" of civilians proved once again the true colors of "constitutional state" and "guardian of human rights" much touted by the U.S., it said. 
					
					 The U.S. has been pursuing hegemony in the world, grossly trampling upon other countries' sovereignty and capriciously committing human rights violations against other nations, it noted, adding that it appears to be increasingly contributing to international disorder.

articles.title: China Denounces American-style Democracy
articles.content:
China Denounces American-style Democracy
 Beijing, May 31 (KCNA) -- The Information Office of State Council of China sharply denounced the American-style democracy in "U.S. human rights record in 2011" issued on May 25.
					 The document said that the capitalization of democratic system is getting more severe in the U.S., turning it into a system whereby money is everything.
					
					 Recalling that money has already become a card in elections in the American political system, it cited concrete facts to prove it.
					
					 It disclosed that 46 percent of the members of the Senate and the House of Representatives of U.S. Congress have properties worth more than a million dollars, adding that for this reason the plan for imposing higher taxes on the circles with higher incomes was rejected at Congress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a Raul Castro por su cumpleanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a Raul Castro por su cumpleanos
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion a Raul Castro Ruz, Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba.
					En el mensaje, el remitente expreso calidas felicitaciones y cordial saludo camaraderil al destinatario en ocasion de su cumpleanos.
					
					Igualmente, le deseo sinceramente buena salud y exitos en sus labores responsables para el avance victorioso de la Revolucion Cubana.

articles.title: CRPP condena maquinacion de banda conservadora de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP condena maquinacion de banda conservadora de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 31 de mayo (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la banda conservadora de Lee Myung Bak se desesperan con frenesi por impedir que los  parlamentarios del Partido Progresista Unido (PPU) tomen los escanos de la "Asamblea Nacional" tildandoles como "izquierdistas pro-Norte (de Corea)" y "comunistas de grupo de la idea Juche".
					En su informacion no. 999 publicada este jueves, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria condeno la campana intrigante de la banda conservadora titere calificandola de un atentado politico fascista y la "caza de brujas" de ultima version para la regobernacion de las fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis.
					
					En las elecciones parlamentarias que tuvieron lugar en abril pasado quedaron electos mucho los integrantes del PPU y otras fuerzas progresistas, lo cual afecto seriamente a las fuerzas conservadoras incluyendo el "Partido Saenuri" que inventaban a su antojo las infames leyes de caracter proyanqui, fascista y antipopular ocupando la mayoria de escanos parlamentarios.
					
					Y ademas sienten una profunda molestia de que si las fuerzas progresistas ocupan la "Asamblea Nacional" se pondra el freno ante sus maquinaciones de confrontacion y de guerra y se creara una situacion desfavorable al mantenimiento y la retoma del sistema del gobierno titere cuando se eleve bruscamente el ambiente de reunificacion mediante la solidaridad con el Norte(de Corea).
					
					La banda titere recurre con frenesi a todas las conspiraciones para exterminar por completo a las fuerzas progresistas interviniendo en el caso del PPU, por una parte y por la otra, se desespera para impedir el ingreso de los personajes de las fuerzas progresistas a la "Asamblea Nacional". 
					
					Persigue su malsano objetivo de crear una nueva fase favorable a la regobernacion de las fuerzas conservadoras en las "elecciones presidenciales" de este ano al eliminar en esta ocasion  a las fuerzas progresistas surcoreanas e impedir la solidaridad de los partidos opositores.
					
					Tambien es ilogica el que la pandilla titere acusa a ciegas a las personalidades de las fuerzas progresistas de "comunistas pro Norte" al decir que ellos "se reunieron con la parte Norte" y "recibieron ordenes del Norte".
					
					La presente represion fascista de la banda titere es una vil matanza politica nunca vista en este mundo  terraqueo.
					
					Los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" y otros traidores proyanquis, los maniacos en la confrontacion anti-reunificacion y los caudillos de fascismo y de corrupcion son los que deben ser eliminados en la "Asamblea Nacional".
					
					Los diversos estratos surcoreanas deben elevar la vigilancia ante la violencia fascista de la banda conservadora titere contra las fuerzas progresistas y condenarla rotundamente, frustrar con las fuerzas unidas el intento de la banda para la regobernacion y crear sin falta una nueva politica y nuevo mundo.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averiguo sobre terreno Almacen para Ninos
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averiguo sobre terreno Almacen para Ninos
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, averiguo el dia primero sobre terreno el Almacen para Ninos.
					 Los empleados y los constructores que recibieron la instruccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en visperas de la inauguracion aceleran la obra en la etapa final
					
					 Choe recorrio varios puntos del almacen donde estan impregnadas las inmortales huellas de direccion del Maximo Dirigente y organizo la reunion consultiva de los funcionarios de las ramas concernientes para cumplir la instruccion del Maximo Dirigente dada en el terreno.
					
					  La reunion subrayo la necesidad de guardar profundamente la noble concepcion de la generacion venidera de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu quienes presentaron a los ninos como reyes del pais.
					
					  Ademas, tomo medida organizativa para producir y suministrar las mercancias para ninos y mejorar el servicio a los ninos.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de Parque Folclorico
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae averigua estado de construccion de Parque Folclorico
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ACNC) -- Entro en la etapa final la obra constructiva del Parque Folclorico de Pyongyang encargada por el Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, hizo conocimiento el dia 31 en el terreno el Parque en visperas de culminacion junto con los funcionarios interesados.
					
					Los constructores militares, guardando las instrucciones del Comandante Supremo del EPC     Kim Jong Un dadas sobre el terreno en enero ultimo, aceleran energicamente la obra con el estilo de lucha y el modo de creacion del ejercito revolucionario de terminar en un instante lo decidido.
					
					 La construccion del Parque es una importante obra para resolver el deseo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien prestaba tanta atencion para ofrecer al pueblo coreano la mas magnifica base cultural, dijo y  subrayo la importancia de terminar la obra.
					
					Menciono que todos los constructores militares deben materializar cabalmente la linea del PTC en materia de la belleza plastica y artistica para garantizar la calidad de la obra en un maximo nivel.
					
					En el terreno, se abordo concretamente el tema de cuidar los comandantes la vida de los soldados con el sentimiento de hermano mayor y hermana mayor y concluir la obra en el principio de facilitar primeramente comodidad del pueblo segun la voluntad del partido.
					
					Choe exhorto a todos los constructores militares a acabar con la obra en maximo nivel bajo la bandera del patriotismo de Kim Jong Il al guardar profundamente la noble concepcion del pueblo del Comandante Supremo.

articles.title: Publicada informacion conjunta de comites coreanos
articles.content:
Publicada informacion conjunta de comites coreanos 
Pyongyang, 1 de junio (ACNC) -- Los comites norteno, sureno y ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publicaron el dia primero la siguiente informacion conjunta:
					Como es conocido ya, en el encuentro de expertos del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar efectuado en la primera quincena de pasado febrero en Shenyang de China, el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio acordo inaugurar solemnemente en el monte Kumgang el acto nacional conjunto para la reunificacion con motivo del 12o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Esto fue el resultado de los justos esfuerzos del movimiento civil por la reunificacion para disminuir cuanto antes el estado actual de confrontacion y abrir el camino de la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, la paz y la reunificacion a traves de la ejecucion de la declaracion Norte-Sur y recibio gran interes y apoyo internos y externos del pais.
					
					Pero, las autoridades surcoreanas insisten en la posicion de no permitir el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio y ejercen presion politica de toda indole a la delegacion del comite sureno que participo en el encuentro de expertos arriba mencionado por la eliminacion del estado de confrontacion y la promocion del acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio.
					
					La historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio debe ser ejecutada sin falta porque es el jalon comun de la reunificacion que ha abierto la nueva epoca en la historia de la nacion.
					
					Debido a la injusta negacion de las autoridades de la parte surena sobre el  encuentro de expertos y a sus maquinaciones de confrontacion fratricidas, los delegados del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar no pueden sentarse en una mesa, razon por la cual el Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio decidio realizar dividido por cada unidad regional el acto conmemorativo del 12o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Aunque se realiza por separado el acto conjunto nacional del 15 de junio de este ano el comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio manifestara invariablemente la firme voluntad y el espiritu de todos los coreanos por la reconciliacion, la paz y la reunificacion independiente bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur.
